text: Boško Abramović (Бошко Абрамовић; 14 February 1951 – 19 December 2021) was a Serbian chess grandmaster.Šah: Ivanišević šampion Srbije , ŠumadijaPress, 6 May 2012. Abramović won the FIDE International Master title in 1980 and the grandmaster title in 1984. He was born in Zrenjanin, Yugoslavia. Abramović died on 19 December 2021, at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Serbian chess players Category:Chess grandmasters Category:2021 deaths Category:Yugoslavian chess players
title: Boško Abramović
